title: The Atheist and the Acorn Falling Acorn Event

content.prompt: The speaker’s response in lines 26-30 to the Atheist’s “Tears” is best described as

choices.label: a smug rebuttal to the Atheist’s argument
a sympathetic account of the Atheist’s pain
an unexpected turn of understanding of the Atheist’s argument
a recognition of the importance of listening to both sides of an issue

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain the function of a significant event or related set of significant events in a plot.
